email_body: I am not who you think I am. I have never been in IDRC nor am I in the profession. Thx, John Jeannine Peaker <jeannine.peaker@idrc.org> on 09/12/2000 02:09:32 PM To: John Arnold/HOU/ECT@ECT cc: Subject: RE: (no subject) We are still showing you as an Active member of IDRC. Do you wish to resign from the membership? -----Original Message----- From: jarnold@ect.enron.com Sent: Tuesday, September 12, 2000 1:59 PM To: Jeannine Peaker Subject: (no subject) Remove me from your mailing list please.
